an4.97:2.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo attahitaya patipanno hoti, no parahitaya?
an4.97:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu, sutananca dhammanam dharakajatiko hoti, dhatananca dhammanam atthupaparikkhi hoti atthamannaya dhammamannaya, dhammanudhammappatipanno hoti;
an4.97:2.3: no ca kalyanavaco hoti kalyanavakkarano poriya vacaya samannagato vissatthaya anelagalaya atthassa vinnapaniya, no ca sandassako hoti samadapako samuttejako sampahamsako sabrahmacarinam.
an4.97:2.4: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo attahitaya patipanno hoti, no parahitaya.
an4.97:3.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo parahitaya patipanno hoti, no attahitaya?
an4.97:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo na heva kho khippanisanti hoti kusalesu dhammesu, no ca sutanam dhammanam dharakajatiko hoti, no ca dhatanam dhammanam atthupaparikkhi hoti, no ca atthamannaya dhammamannaya dhammanudhammappatipanno hoti;
an4.97:3.3: kalyanavaco ca hoti kalyanavakkarano poriya vacaya samannagato vissatthaya anelagalaya atthassa vinnapaniya, sandassako ca hoti samadapako samuttejako sampahamsako sabrahmacarinam.
an4.97:3.4: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo parahitaya patipanno hoti, no attahitaya.
an4.97:4.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo nevattahitaya patipanno hoti, no parahitaya?
an4.97:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo na heva kho khippanisanti hoti kusalesu dhammesu, no ca sutanam dhammanam dharakajatiko hoti, no ca dhatanam dhammanam atthupaparikkhi hoti, no ca atthamannaya dhammamannaya dhammanudhammappatipanno hoti;
an4.97:4.3: no ca kalyanavaco hoti kalyanavakkarano poriya vacaya samannagato vissatthaya anelagalaya atthassa vinnapaniya, no ca sandassako hoti samadapako samuttejako sampahamsako sabrahmacarinam.
an4.97:4.4: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo nevattahitaya patipanno hoti, no parahitaya.
an4.97:5.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo attahitaya ceva patipanno hoti parahitaya ca?
an4.97:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu, sutananca dhammanam dharakajatiko hoti, dhatananca dhammanam atthupaparikkhi hoti atthamannaya dhammamannaya, dhammanudhammappatipanno hoti;
an4.97:5.3: kalyanavaco ca hoti kalyanavakkarano poriya vacaya samannagato vissatthaya anelagalaya atthassa vinnapaniya, sandassako ca hoti samadapako samuttejako sampahamsako sabrahmacarinam.
an4.97:5.4: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo attahitaya ceva patipanno hoti parahitaya ca.
an4.97:5.5: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaro puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmin”ti.
